# limel-example-portal-basic



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Disconnect test

This is an example to test that it works to remove a popover from the DOM,
then add it back again without breaking it

## Dependencies

### Depends on

- [limel-button](../../button)
- [limel-popover](../../popover)

### Graph
```mermaid
graph TD;
  limel-example-portal-basic --> limel-button
  limel-example-portal-basic --> limel-popover
  limel-button --> limel-icon
  limel-button --> limel-spinner
  limel-popover --> limel-portal
  limel-popover --> limel-popover-surface

```
